talk.utter: Bernie was right the whole time

talk.author: did:plc:ae3rhmesh3aufzcuogcvb7v4
talk.utter: No, Bernie was horribly wrong. He never realized that his beloved WWC leaned fascist.

talk.author: did:plc:bcybd4duwf52u5rvrcdyfuw3
talk.utter: pretty clear that the right wing appeal to the working class isn't just limited to whites

talk.author: did:plc:bcybd4duwf52u5rvrcdyfuw3
talk.utter: pretty clear that the right wing appeal to the working class isn't just limited to whites

talk.author: did:plc:ae3rhmesh3aufzcuogcvb7v4
talk.utter:
No, it is. Trump won because the white percentage of the vote went up from 67% to 71%, or an additional 6.5 million white votes.

It was the first time in more than sixty years that the white vote went up as a percentage of the total vote.

talk.author: did:plc:bcybd4duwf52u5rvrcdyfuw3
talk.utter: I think you have your head in the sand if you think that the rightward swing of Latinos (especially no-college men) is just turnout.
